code: import React,{use}from'react';import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Container,Row,Card,Col}from'react-bootstrap';import"../assets/css/Skills.css";import{FaPython,FaCode,FaDatabase,FaCloud,FaTools,FaVial,FaUsers}from"react-icons/fa";import API_BASE_URL from'../config';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Skills=()=>{useEffect(()=>{document.title="Skills | Ajay Maddineni";},[]);const[skills,setSkills]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"api/skills")).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setSkills(data)).finally(()=>setLoading(false));},[]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"pt-5 mt-5 text-center text-light",children:"Loading Skills..."});}const iconMap={"Programming Languages":/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaPython,{className:"skill-icon"}),"Development":/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaCode,{className:"skill-icon"}),"Databases":/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaDatabase,{className:"skill-icon"}),"Cloud & Deployment":/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaCloud,{className:"skill-icon"}),"Dev & AI Tools":/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaTools,{className:"skill-icon"}),"Testing":/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaVial,{className:"skill-icon"}),"Soft Skills":/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaUsers,{className:"skill-icon"})};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"mt-5 pt-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"mb-4 text-center skills-title",children:"Skills"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{className:"g-4",children:skills.map((skill,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"skill-card shadow-sm",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Title,{className:"icon_text",children:[iconMap[skill.category]," ",skill.category]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{children:skill.skills.join(",")})]})})},index))})]})})});};export default Skills;
